description: Loki v2+ showcase using JSON NGINX access logs.

targets.expr: sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

options.content:
📊 Dashboard created by Ward Bekker (hope you like it!)

🐦 Follow me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wardbekker) & [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wardbekker/) for  Grafana Loki updates 

🎥 Check out my [Grafana Loki video's](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDGkOdUX1UjqEzcxQrbROMy8DN7MZv_h4) on Youtube

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | status >= 500 |__error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | __error__=""[$__interval]))/ 100)
sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
topk(10, sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" and  __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | geoip_country_code != "" and  __error__="" [$__interval])))
{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | line_format "➡️ {{.request_method}} {{.request_uri}} with HTTP status: {{.status}} "
quantile_over_time(0.95,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

topk(10, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json |  http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" and http_referer !~ ".*?\\*\\*\\*.*?" | __error__="" [15m])))

sortBy.displayName: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:108.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/108.0

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (request_User-Agent) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))
topk(10, sum by (remote_addr, geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json |  __error__="" [15m])))

topk(10, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__="" [15m])))

title: Grafana Loki Dashboard for NGINX Service Mesh
